assignments.description: Adds the assigned product transfer to the finalProductTransfers record collection variable.

assignments.description: Assignment to add assigned Product Transfer State to collection variable.

assignments.description: Add the Serialised Product with updated values to the record collection.
assignments.name: Add_Serialised_Products
assignments.label: Add Serialised Products

assignments.description: Adds the assigned updated Product Transfer to record collection
assignments.name: Add_Updated_Product_Transfer
assignments.label: Add Updated Product Transfer

assignments.description: Assigns the Serialised Product record to recordId variable.
assignments.name: Assign_Serialised_Product_Record_to_recordId_Variable
assignments.label: Assign Serialised Product Record to recordId Variable

assignments.description: Assign the relevant variables to be used in the product transfer assignment.
assignments.name: Assign_the_product_transfer_details
assignments.label: Assign the product transfer details

assignments.description: Assigns the expected return date for the Product Transfer records.
assignments.name: Assign_The_Product_Transfer_Details_BF
assignments.label: Assign The Product Transfer Details

assignments.description: Assigns the variables for Product Transfers.
assignments.name: Assign_The_Product_Transfer_Details_Single
assignments.label: Assign the Product Transfer Details

assignments.description: Assigns the expected return date for the Product Transfer records.
assignments.name: Assign_The_Product_Transfer_Details_Single_BF
assignments.label: Assign The Product Transfer Details

assignments.description: Assigns the unavailable Serialised Product ID to a record variable so this can be referenced in a decision.
assignments.name: Assign_Unavailable_Multiset_Serialised_Product_Record_ID
assignments.label: Assign Unavailable Multiset Serialised Product Record ID

assignments.description: Assigns the new variables to Product Transfer State in order to add to record collection.
assignments.name: Assignment_for_Create_Product_Transfer_State
assignments.label: Assignment for Create Product Transfer State

assignments.description: Assigns new values to created Product Transfer record.
assignments.name: Assignment_for_Updating_Product_Transfers
assignments.label: Assignment for Updating Product Transfers

assignments.description: Assigns the new variables to record variable in order to update Serialised Products.
assignments.name: Assignment_for_Updating_Serialised_Product
assignments.label: Assignment for Updating Serialised Product

decisions.description: Checks to ensure the expected return date entered is not later than the safety check date on the Serialised Product record.
decisions.name: Check_Booking_Validity
decisions.label: Check Booking Validity

rules.name: Missing_Equipment_Alternate
rules.conditionLogic: ((1 AND 9 AND 2) OR (1 AND 9 AND 3) OR (1 AND 9 AND 4) OR (1 AND 9 AND 5) OR (1 AND 9 AND 6) OR (1 AND 9 AND 7) OR (1 AND 9 AND 8) )
rules.label: Missing Equipment Alternate

decisions.description: Checks to ensure the expected return date entered is not later than the safety check date on the Serialised Product record.
decisions.name: Check_Booking_Validity1
decisions.label: Check Booking Validity

decisions.description: Checks to ensure the expected return date entered is not later than the safety check date on the Serialised Product record.
decisions.name: Check_Booking_Validity_Multiset_Behalf_Of
decisions.label: Check Booking Validity

decisions.description: Checks to ensure the expected return date entered is not later than the safety check date on the Serialised Product record.
decisions.name: Check_Booking_Validity_Multiset_Running_User
decisions.label: Check Booking Validity

rules.name: Missing_Permission_Alternate
rules.conditionLogic: (1 AND 9 AND 2) OR (1 AND 9 AND 3) OR (1 AND 9 AND 4) OR (1 AND 9 AND 5) OR (1 AND 9 AND 6) OR (1 AND 9 AND 7) OR (1 AND 9 AND 8)
rules.label: Missing Permission Alternate

decisions.description: Decision to check if the chosen user is a competent user and has permission to own the item being booked out.
decisions.name: Check_If_Chosen_User_Is_Competent_User
decisions.label: Check If Chosen User Is Competent User

rules.name: Authorised_User_Enabled
rules.conditionLogic: (1 AND 9 AND 2) OR (1 AND 9 AND 3) OR (1 AND 9 AND 4) OR (1 AND 9 AND 5) OR (1 AND 9 AND 6) OR (1 AND 9 AND 7) OR (1 AND 9 AND 8)
rules.label: Authorised User Enabled

decisions.description: Decision to check if the chosen user is a competent user and has permission to own the item being booked out.
decisions.name: Check_If_Chosen_User_Is_Competent_User_Single
decisions.label: Check If Chosen User Is Competent User

rules.name: Authorised_User_Alternate
rules.conditionLogic: (1 AND 9 AND 2) OR (1 AND 9 AND 3) OR (1 AND 9 AND 4) OR (1 AND 9 AND 5) OR (1 AND 9 AND 6) OR (1 AND 9 AND 7) OR (1 AND 9 AND 8)
rules.label: Authorised User Alternate

decisions.description: Checks if a Serialised Product is found where the ENID entered matches ENID field.
decisions.name: Check_If_ENID_Serialised_Product_Found
decisions.label: Check If ENID Serialised Product Found

decisions.description: Checks to see if the item is recalled.
decisions.name: Check_If_Recalled
decisions.label: Check If Recalled

decisions.description: Decides if the initial Multiset Serialised Product is available for book out.
decisions.name: Check_Initial_Multiset_Availability
decisions.label: Check Initial Multiset Availability

decisions.description: Decides if the chosen Serialised Products within the multiset is available for book out.
decisions.name: Check_Multiset_Availability
decisions.label: Check Multiset Availability

decisions.description: Checks the current item in the loop for their Item Status.
decisions.name: Check_Multiset_Serialised_Product_Item_Status
decisions.label: Check Multiset Serialised Product Item Status

decisions.description: Decides if the chosen serialised product is available and active for book out.
decisions.name: Check_Serialised_Product_Availability
decisions.label: Check Serialised Product Availability

decisions.description: Checks that competent user permission set has been found, and serialised product record type has been found
decisions.name: CheckRecordsFound
decisions.label: Check Records Found

decisions.description: Checks if the user is booking for themselves or on behalf of somebody else.
decisions.name: Copy_1_of_Is_User_Booking_For_Themself
decisions.label: User Booking For Themself?

decisions.description: Performs an initial check on the Serialised Product to see if this is part of a Multiset kit. Also checks to ensure the category is not appendix 1 and personal issue, items of this category should be issued rather than booked out by authorised/competent users.
decisions.name: Initial_Multiset_Check_Category_Check
decisions.label: Initial Multiset Check & Category Check

decisions.description: Checks if the user is booking for themselves or on behalf of somebody else.
decisions.name: Is_User_Booking_For_Themself
decisions.label: Is User Booking For Themself?

decisions.description: Checks whether the flow has been invoked from a Quick Action or a Global Action.
decisions.name: Quick_Action_or_Global_Action
decisions.label: Quick Action or Global Action

Flow.description: Screen flow for users to book out compliance stores equipment.

formulas.description: Checks if the user has confirmed they are booking for someone else.,
formulas.name: Booking_For_Blank_Check

formulas.description: Checks if the booking for field was entered whilst user was booking out the multiset Serialised Product.
formulas.name: Booking_For_Blank_Check_Multiset

formulas.description: Returns the full name of the running user record.
formulas.name: Full_Running_User_Name_Return

formulas.description: Formula to check if the safety check date is blank on the Serialised Product record.
formulas.name: Safety_Check_Date

formulas.description: Stores todays date for checking that the expected return date entered by user isn't earlier than today.
formulas.name: Today

Flow.label: Compliance Stores - Book Out

loops.description: Loops through the created product transfers.
loops.name: Loop_Created_Product_Transfers
loops.label: Loop Created Product Transfers

loops.description: Loop through the recordids collection variable in order to generate product transfer records for each (multiset or single).
loops.name: Loop_recordids_Collection_Variable
loops.label: Loop recordids Collection Variable

loops.description: Loops through recordids in order to update each Serialised Product following Product Transfer.
loops.name: Loop_Serialised_Products
loops.label: Loop Serialised Products

loops.description: Loops through the active multiset Serialised Products to check if any are not sat in available status.
loops.name: Loop_Through_Active_Multiset_Serialised_Products
loops.label: Loop Through Active Multiset Serialised Products

loops.description: Loops through the created Product Transfers in order to update the records.
loops.name: Loop_to_Update_Product_Transfers
loops.label: Loop to Update Product Transfers

recordCreates.description: Creates all Product Transfer records as needed.
recordCreates.name: Create_Product_Transfer_State_Records
recordCreates.label: Create Product Transfer State Records

recordLookups.name: Check_Permissions_of_Booked_For_User
recordLookups.label: Check Permissions of Booked For User

recordLookups.description: Get Records element to find all Serialised Products which have the same Parent Energy Networks ID as the Serialised Product the user is attempting to book out.

recordLookups.description: Gets the record type ID of the compliance stores record type for the Product Transfer object.

recordLookups.name: Get_Contractor_Competent_Permission_Set_Id

recordLookups.label: Get Location Record of Booked For User

recordLookups.description: Finds the Location record of the chosen Location from the previous screen.
recordLookups.name: Get_Location_Record_of_Booked_For_User_Multiset
recordLookups.label: Get Location Record of Booked For User

recordLookups.description: Finds the Location record which is type 'User' and is linked to the User record of the running user.
recordLookups.name: Get_Location_Record_of_Running_User
recordLookups.label: Get Location Record of Running User

recordLookups.description: Finds the Location record which is type 'User' and is linked to the User record of the running user.
recordLookups.name: Get_Location_Record_of_Running_User_Multiset
recordLookups.label: Get Location Record of Booked For User

recordLookups.description: Finds the Location record which is marked as 'Is Person Location' and contains the name user entered in the previous screen.
recordLookups.name: Get_Location_Records_of_Booking_For_User
recordLookups.label: Get Location Records of Booking For User

recordLookups.description: Finds the Location record that contains the name user entered in the previous screen.
recordLookups.name: Get_Location_Records_of_Booking_For_User_Multiset
recordLookups.label: Get Location Records of Booking For User

recordLookups.description: Checks if the user has permission set assignment for Competent User
recordLookups.name: Get_Permission_Set_Assignment_Id
recordLookups.label: Get Permission Set Assignment Id

recordLookups.description: Gets the Serialised Product record via the ENID entry from user on previous screen.
recordLookups.name: Get_Serialised_Product_from_ENID_Entry
recordLookups.label: Get Serialised Product from ENID Entry

recordLookups.description: Get Records to get the users full name who the item is being booked out for.
recordLookups.name: Get_the_Booked_For_User_Name
recordLookups.label: Get the Booked For User Name

recordLookups.description: Get Records to get the users full name who the item is being booked out for.
recordLookups.name: Get_the_Booked_For_User_Name_Multiset
recordLookups.label: Get the Booked For User Name

fields.name: Energy_Networks_ID

fields.name: Expected_Return_Date
fields.fieldText: Expected Return Date

fields.name: Display_Safety_Check_Date
fields.fieldText: Please note, the latest you can return this is {!recordId.SPEN_Safety_Check_Date__c} as a safety check is required on this date.

fields.name: Site_Description
fields.fieldText: Site Description

fields.name: Booking_For_Display_Text
fields.fieldText: Only enter the below field if you are booking on behalf of somebody else.

fields.name: On_Behalf_Of_Text

fields.name: Display_Safety_Check_Date_Multiset
fields.fieldText: Please note, the latest you can return this multiset is {!recordId.SPEN_Safety_Check_Date__c} as a safety check is required on this date.

screens.description: Screen to manually capture the ENID from the equipment due to being invoked from a global action.
screens.name: Capture_ENID_Screen
screens.label: Capture ENID Screen

fields.name: ENID_Entry_Text
fields.fieldText: Input or Scan Energy Networks ID:

screens.description: Confirmation screen to show user component(s) booked.
screens.name: Confirmation_Screen
screens.label: Confirmation Screen

fields.name: SingleConfirmation
fields.fieldText:
The below item is now booked out:


Energy Network ID: {!recordId.SPEN_Energy_Networks_ID__c}

Product Name: {!recordId.Product2.Name}

Category: {!recordId.SPEN_Category__c}

Description: {!recordId.SPEN_Item_Description__c}

Expected Return Date: {!final_expected_return_date}

Booked For: {!Final_User_Name}

﻿Location: {!Final_Location_Name}

fields.name: MultisetConfirmation
fields.fieldText:
The multiset item is now booked out:


Parent Energy Network ID: {!recordId.SPEN_Parent_Energy_Networks_ID__c}

Expected Return Date: {!final_expected_return_date}

Booked For: {!Final_User_Name}

﻿Location: {!Final_Location_Name}

screens.description: Displays the component being booked out.
screens.name: Display_Component_Screen
screens.label: Display Component Screen

fields.name: Component_Display_Text
fields.fieldText: See below the component being booked out:

screens.description: Displays the component being booked out.
screens.name: Display_Component_Screen1
screens.label: Display Component Screen

fields.name: Multiset_Components_Display_Text1
fields.fieldText: See below the component being booked out:

screens.description: Displays the individual components within the multiset.
screens.name: Display_Components_Screen
screens.label: Display Components Screen

fields.name: Multiset_Components_Display_Text
fields.fieldText: See below the components currently contained within this multiset.

screens.description: Displays the individual components within the multiset.
screens.name: Display_Components_Screen1
screens.label: Display Components Screen

fields.name: Multiset_Components_Display_Text_1
fields.fieldText: See below the components currently contained within this multiset.

screens.description: Screen to confirm to the user that they don't have the relevant permissions to book out the item in their name.
screens.name: Failed_Permission_Check_Screen
screens.label: Failed Permission Check

fields.name: NotAuthorisedDisplayText
fields.fieldText:
You are not authorised to book out this item in your name.


If you should have authorisation, please speak with your team leader/manager to request access.

screens.description: Screen to confirm to the user that the ENID entered is not valid/doesn't match a Serialised Product record.
screens.name: Invalid_ENID_Screen
screens.label: Invalid ENID Screen

fields.name: InvalidENIDDisplayText
fields.fieldText: The chosen Energy Networks ID is not valid. Please input or scan an ID that matches a valid item.

screens.description: Screen to confirm to user that the serialised product is non bookable as it's currently being recalled.
screens.name: Item_Is_Recalled_Confirmation_Screen
screens.label: Item Is Recalled Confirmation

fields.name: Item_Recalled_Display_Text
fields.fieldText:
Current Status: {!recordId.SPEN_Item_Status__c}

Current Location: {!recordId.SPEN_Location_Name__c}


You can't book this equipment as it's currently being recalled.

screens.description: Confirms to user that this item needs to be booked out to the user via the issue item.
screens.name: Item_Should_Be_Issued_Screen
screens.label: Item Should Be Issued Screen

fields.name: itemIssueDisplayText
fields.fieldText: You cannot directly book this item as it is appendix 1/personal issue equipment.

screens.description: Screen to confirm to the user that the system is missing permission sets.
screens.name: Missing_Permission_Sets_Screen
screens.label: Missing Permission Sets Screen

fields.name: MissingPermissionSetsDisplay
fields.fieldText:
There are missing permissions in the system. Please advise the system administrator of the below issue.


One of the below custom permissions are missing in the Salesforce system:


  • Competent User
  • Competent User Contractor

screens.description: Screen to confirm the Compliance Stores record type for Serialised Products is missing from the system.
screens.name: Missing_Serialised_Product_Record_Type_Screen
screens.label: Missing Serialised Product Record Type Screen

fields.name: MissingSerialisedProductRecordTypeDisplayText
fields.fieldText:
You cannot book out an item at this time. Please advise the system administrator of the below issue.


The below Record Type is missing from the Serialised Product object:


  • Compliance Stores

screens.description: Screen to confirm the Compliance Stores record type for Product Transfer is missing from the system.
screens.name: Missing_System_Record_Type_Product_Transfer
screens.label: Missing System Record Type

fields.name: MissingProductTransferRecordTypeDisplayText
fields.fieldText:
You cannot book out an item at this time. Please advise the system administrator of the below issue.


The below Record Type is missing from the Product Transfer object:


  • Compliance Stores

screens.description: Screen to confirm the Compliance Stores record type for Location is missing from the system.
screens.name: Missing_System_Record_Type_Screen
screens.label: Missing System Record Type

fields.name: MissingLocationRecordTypeDisplayText
fields.fieldText:
You cannot book out an item at this time. Please advise the system administrator of the below issue.


The below Record Type is missing from the Location object:


  • Compliance Stores

screens.description: Screen to confirm to user that the serialised product is non bookable as it's not active/available status.
screens.name: Non_Bookable_Confirmation
screens.label: Non Bookable Confirmation

fields.name: Non_Bookable_Display_Text
fields.fieldText:
Current Status: {!recordId.SPEN_Item_Status__c}

Current Location: {!recordId.SPEN_Current_Location__r.Name}


You can't book this equipment as it's not available on the shelf for issue.

screens.description: Screen to confirm to user that the Serialised Product is non bookable as they are attempting to return later than the safety check date on the Serialised Product record.
screens.name: Non_Bookable_Confirmation1
screens.label: Non Bookable Confirmation

fields.name: Copy_1_of_Non_Bookable_Display_Text
fields.fieldText: You can't book this equipment as you are attempting to return it after a safety check is due.

screens.description: Screen to confirm to user that the Serialised Product is non bookable as they are attempting to return earlier than today's date.
screens.name: Non_Bookable_Confirmation_Early
screens.label: Non Bookable Confirmation

fields.name: Non_Bookable_Display_Text_Early
fields.fieldText: The expected return date is earlier than today's date. Please go back and amend to the correct date.

screens.description: Screen to confirm to user that the serialised product is non bookable as it's not active/available status.
screens.name: Non_Bookable_Confirmation_Multiset
screens.label: Non Bookable Confirmation

fields.name: Non_Multiset_Bookable_Display_Text
fields.fieldText:
Energy Networks ID: {!Get_Unavailable_Multiset_Serialised_Product.SPEN_Energy_Networks_ID__c}

Product: {!Get_Unavailable_Multiset_Serialised_Product.Product2.Name}

Category: {!Get_Unavailable_Multiset_Serialised_Product.SPEN_Category__c}

Current Status: {!Get_Unavailable_Multiset_Serialised_Product.SPEN_Item_Status__c}

Current Location: {!Get_Unavailable_Multiset_Serialised_Product.SPEN_Location_Name__c}


You can't book this multiset as the above piece is not available on the shelf for issue.

screens.description: Screen to confirm to user that the serialised product is non bookable as it's currently being recalled.
screens.name: Recalled_Confirmation_Part_Set
screens.label: Recalled Confirmation

fields.name: Recalled_Multiset_Display_Text
fields.fieldText:
Energy Networks ID: {!Get_Unavailable_Multiset_Serialised_Product.SPEN_Energy_Networks_ID__c}

Product: {!Get_Unavailable_Multiset_Serialised_Product.Product2.Name}

Category: {!Get_Unavailable_Multiset_Serialised_Product.SPEN_Category__c}

Current Status: {!Get_Unavailable_Multiset_Serialised_Product.SPEN_Item_Status__c}

Current Location: {!Get_Unavailable_Multiset_Serialised_Product.SPEN_Location_Name__c}


You can't book this multiset as the above piece is currently in the process of being recalled.

screens.description: Screen to confirm to user that the user they've chosen to book out for is unauthorised to own the item.
screens.name: Unauthorised_Selection_Retry
screens.label: Unauthorised Selection - Retry

fields.name: BookedForUnauthorised
fields.fieldText: You have chosen a user who does not have permission to own items. Please choose a different user to book this item out to.

screens.description: Screen to confirm to user that the user they've chosen to book out for is unauthorised to own the item.
screens.name: Unauthorised_Selection_Retry_Single
screens.label: Unauthorised Selection - Retry

fields.name: Copy_1_of_BookedForUnauthorised
fields.fieldText: You have chosen a user who does not have permission to own items. Please choose a different user to book this item out to.

screens.description: Allows user to select the correct user/location for the booking out process.
screens.name: User_Selection_Screen
screens.label: User Selection Screen

fields.name: User_Selection_Display_Text
fields.fieldText: Please confirm the user to book this equipment out for.

screens.description: Allows user to select the correct user/location for the booking out process.
screens.name: User_Selection_Screen_Multiset
screens.label: User Selection Screen - Multiset

fields.name: Copy_1_of_User_Selection_Display_Text
fields.fieldText: Please confirm the user to book this equipment out for.

variables.description: Holds the assigned product transfer details prior to being entered in product transfer collection
variables.name: assigned_product_transfer

variables.description: Holds the selected expected return date entered by the user on screen element.
variables.name: final_expected_return_date

variables.description: Stores the final Location Id that should be entered on the new Product Transfer record.
variables.name: Final_Location_Id

variables.description: Stores the final site description chosen by the user.
variables.name: final_site_description

variables.description: Stores the chosen User name field.
variables.name: Final_User_Name

variables.description: Stores the serialised product Id where the flow has been invoked from.
variables.name: recordId

variables.description: Stores the record ID of the unavailable multiset Serialised Product if one is found.
variables.name: Unavailable_Multiset_Serialised_Product_Storage

variables.description: Stores the expected return date entered by the user.
variables.name: Validated_Expected_Return_Date
